wordpressPost.title: Paper Cthulhu
wordpressPost.content: A link has been given me through MSN. A very interesting link at that. It supposedly guards the secret to making a Cthulhu out of paper complete with cutouts and vague instructions, just like you'd want. The only problem is that the images aren't high resolution so the outcome isn't looking too rosey.
